title: Content Coverage
description: Analyze how well your questions cover the source content

selectModule.title: Select a Module
selectModule.description: Choose a module to analyze its content coverage
selectModule.noModulesDescription: No modules are available for coverage analysis.
selectModule.needsContent: This module needs extracted content for analysis
selectModule.needsQuestions: This module needs questions for analysis

loading.computingDescription: Analyzing semantic similarity between questions and content. This may take a few seconds.

errors.loadModulesMessage: Unable to load available modules for coverage analysis.
errors.computeFailedMessage: Unable to compute coverage for this module. Please try again.

experimental.title: Experimental Feature
experimental.message: Coverage analysis is experimental and may not be 100% accurate. Use it as a guide, not an absolute measure.

explanation.title: How coverageanalysis works
explanation.intro: The analysis measures how well your questions address the source content using semantic similarity.
explanation.process: Each sentence in your content is compared to your questions using a textembedding-model. The highest similarity score determines the coverage level:

thresholds.high: High (â‰¥70%): Strongly related to a question
thresholds.none: None (<30%): Not covered by any question

explanation.note: Each question maps to at most 3 sentences to prevent general questions from inflating scores.
